name: Princess Room Cleaning
description:
Welcome to Princess Room Cleaning game.A cute little princess Aisha is at home, her parents were out of town for a while, she is alone at home.She made a mess at home.Everything is messy and dirty.She need to make everything perfect before her parents arrive home.

You need to help her for cleaning and repairing.Get into her home and observe everything and start home cleaning.
There are 5 different place to clean. Bedroom, Hall, kitchen, bathroom, garden.

You will start with Hall, Turn of tv and ac.Clean table and arrange items on table and sofa.Put garbage in Dustbin.Clean floor with a viper. Have a good cloth to clean the wall.

Now its time to clean kitchen, Arrange fruit and food in refrigerator.Clean dishes with soap and put them in a shelf.Throw dirt in dustbin.Use wiper and cotton to clean food on floor.

After cleaning kitchen , clean messy bathroom.Turn of the tap.Arrange soap and toys in bathroom to their place, and clean wash basin with brush.Put dirty toilet paper in dustbin.Wash toilet with liquid, rub with cotton and then wash with brush.Empty bathtub and clean it with brush.

Now head towards to bedroom, put cloth in basket.Use broom to clean floor and window.Go to the garden and remove dirty plants.Use seeds and spray some water to plant a new tree.


Key features 

-Simple game easy to play
-Amazing room cleaning activities
-Amazing Graphics.
-Step by step cleaning process
-Variety of place to clean
-Different tools and objects to use for cleaning

List of Rooms to clean
-Hall 
-Kitchen
-Bathroom
-Bedroom
-Garden

Let’s try this game to perform great room cleaning activity.Lets see what you can do to help Cute little princess Aisha.
